What is Libiss POS

Libiss POS is a fast and reliable point-of-sale system designed for clothing stores.

Fast checkout
Offline mode
Easy to use

What you can do

Sell products
Manage inventory
Print receipts
Track sales

Works without internet

Sell and manage your store even when you’re offline. Everything syncs automatically when connection is back.

Platforms

One system. Multiple devices.

Windows / Desktop POS
Android POS
